akn:content.akn:p: (a) Frequency of reports Not later than the date that is 1 year after October 10, 2000, and not later than the end of each 1-year period thereafter, the Task Force shall submit to the Congress a report on the work of the Task Force during the preceding 1-year period.
(b) Contents of reports Each report under subsection (a) shall set forth, at a minimum—
